sourceElement.description: catalog categories which are accessible for this principal

targetElement.description: Principals which are allowed to access this catalog category

attribute.description: The categories of the active CatalogVersion

property.name: query
property.value: "# The query for this view will be generated with the essential data # "

property.name: query
property.value: "# The query for this view will be generated with the essential data # "

attribute.description: Predicted count of items to remove

property.name: query
property.value:
"SELECT {sij:targetVersion}, 
"+ " {sij:code}, 
"+ " {sicj:PK}, 
"+ " {sicj:result}, 
"+ " {sicj:startTime}, 
"+ " {sicj:endTime} 
"+ "FROM { 
"+ " SyncItemCronJob AS sicj LEFT JOIN 
"+ " SyncItemJob AS sij ON 
"+ " {sicj:job} = {sij:pk} 
"+ "} 
"+ "WHERE {sij:sourceVersion} = ?sourceVersion 
"+ "AND {sij:targetVersion} IS NOT NULL 
"

property.name: query
property.value:
"SELECT tbl.sourceItem, tbl.targetItem, tbl.modifiedTime , tbl.lastSyncTime, tbl.type, tbl.ord FROM ( 
"+
" {{SELECT 
"+ " {p1:PK} as sourceItem, 
"+ " {p2:PK} as targetItem, 
"+ " {p1:modifiedtime} as modifiedTime, 
"+ " {ts:lastSyncSourceModifiedTime} as lastSyncTime, 
"+ " 'Product' as type, 
"+ " {p1:code} as ord 
"+ " FROM {Product* as p1 JOIN ItemSyncTimestamp* as ts 
"+ " ON {p1:catalogVersion}=?job.sourceVersion AND {p1:PK}={ts:sourceItem} AND 
"+ " {ts:sourceVersion}=?job.sourceVersion AND {ts:targetVersion}=?job.targetVersion 
"+ " JOIN Product* as p2 
"+ " ON {p2:catalogVersion}=?job.targetVersion AND {p2:PK}={ts:targetItem} } 
"+ " WHERE {p1:modifiedtime}>{ts:lastSyncSourceModifiedTime} 
"+ " }} 
"+ "UNION ALL 
"+
" {{SELECT 
"+ " {p1:PK} as sourceItem, 
"+ " {p2:PK} as targetItem, 
"+ " {p1:modifiedtime} as modifiedTime, 
"+ " null as lastSyncTime, 
"+ " 'Product' as type, 
"+ " {p1:code} as ord 
"+ " FROM {Product* as p1 
"+ " LEFT JOIN Product* as p2 
"+ " ON {p1:catalogVersion}=?job.sourceVersion AND {p2:catalogVersion}=?job.targetVersion AND 
"+ " {p1:code}={p2:code} 
"+ " LEFT JOIN ItemSyncTimestamp* AS ts 
"+ " ON {ts:sourceVersion}=?job.sourceVersion AND {ts:targetVersion}=?job.targetVersion AND 
"+ " ({ts:sourceItem}={p1:pk} OR {ts:targetItem}={p2:PK} ) } 
"+ " WHERE {p1:catalogVersion}=?job.sourceVersion AND {ts:pk} IS NULL
"+ " }} 
"+ "UNION ALL 
"+
" {{SELECT 
"+ " {p1:PK} as sourceItem, 
"+ " {p2:PK} as targetItem, 
"+ " {p1:modifiedtime} as modifiedTime, 
"+ " {ts:lastSyncSourceModifiedTime} as lastSyncTime, 
"+ " 'Category' as type, 
"+ " {p1:code} as ord 
"+ " FROM {Category* as p1 JOIN ItemSyncTimestamp* as ts 
"+ " ON {p1:catalogVersion}=?job.sourceVersion AND {p1:PK}={ts:sourceItem} AND 
"+ " {ts:sourceVersion}=?job.sourceVersion AND {ts:targetVersion}=?job.targetVersion 
"+ " JOIN Category* as p2 
"+ " ON {p2:catalogVersion}=?job.targetVersion AND {p2:PK}={ts:targetItem} } 
"+ " WHERE {p1:modifiedtime}>{ts:lastSyncSourceModifiedTime} 
"+ " }} 
"+ "UNION ALL 
"+
" {{SELECT 
"+ " {p1:PK} as sourceItem, 
"+ " {p2:PK} as targetItem, 
"+ " {p1:modifiedtime} as modifiedTime, 
"+ " null as lastSyncTime, 
"+ " 'Category' as type, 
"+ " {p1:code} as ord 
"+ " FROM {Category* as p1 LEFT JOIN Category* as p2 
"+ " ON {p1:catalogVersion}=?job.sourceVersion AND {p2:catalogVersion}=?job.targetVersion AND 
"+ " {p1:code}={p2:code} 
"+ " LEFT JOIN ItemSyncTimestamp* AS ts 
"+ " ON {ts:sourceVersion}=?job.sourceVersion AND {ts:targetVersion}=?job.targetVersion AND 
"+ " ({ts:sourceItem}={p1:pk} OR {ts:targetItem}={p2:PK} ) } 
"+ " WHERE {p1:catalogVersion}=?job.sourceVersion AND {ts:pk} IS NULL
"+ " }} 
"+ "UNION ALL 
"+
" {{SELECT 
"+ " {p1:PK} as sourceItem, 
"+ " {p2:PK} as targetItem, 
"+ " {p1:modifiedtime} as modifiedTime, 
"+ " {ts:lastSyncSourceModifiedTime} as lastSyncTime, 
"+ " 'Keyword' as type, 
"+ " {p1:keyword} as ord 
"+ " FROM {Keyword* as p1 JOIN ItemSyncTimestamp* as ts 
"+ " ON {p1:catalogVersion}=?job.sourceVersion AND {p1:PK}={ts:sourceItem} AND 
"+ " {ts:sourceVersion}=?job.sourceVersion AND {ts:targetVersion}=?job.targetVersion 
"+ " JOIN Keyword* as p2 
"+ " ON {p2:catalogVersion}=?job.targetVersion AND {p2:PK}={ts:targetItem} } 
"+ " WHERE {p1:modifiedtime}>{ts:lastSyncSourceModifiedTime} 
"+ " }} 
"+ "UNION ALL 
"+
" {{SELECT 
"+ " {p1:PK} as sourceItem, 
"+ " {p2:PK} as targetItem, 
"+ " {p1:modifiedtime} as modifiedTime, 
"+ " null as lastSyncTime, 
"+ " 'Keyword' as type, 
"+ " {p1:keyword} as ord 
"+ " FROM {Keyword* as p1 LEFT JOIN Keyword* as p2 
"+ " ON {p1:catalogVersion}=?job.sourceVersion AND {p2:catalogVersion}=?job.targetVersion AND 
"+ " {p1:keyword}={p2:keyword} 
"+ " LEFT JOIN ItemSyncTimestamp* AS ts 
"+ " ON {ts:sourceVersion}=?job.sourceVersion AND {ts:targetVersion}=?job.targetVersion AND 
"+ " ({ts:sourceItem}={p1:pk} OR {ts:targetItem}={p2:PK} ) } 
"+ " WHERE {p1:catalogVersion}=?job.sourceVersion AND {ts:pk} IS NULL
"+ " }} 
"+ "UNION ALL 
"+
" {{SELECT 
"+ " {p1:PK} as sourceItem, 
"+ " {p2:PK} as targetItem, 
"+ " {p1:modifiedtime} as modifiedTime, 
"+ " {ts:lastSyncSourceModifiedTime} as lastSyncTime, 
"+ " 'Media' as type, 
"+ " {p1:code} as ord 
"+ " FROM {Media* as p1 JOIN ItemSyncTimestamp* as ts 
"+ " ON {p1:catalogVersion}=?job.sourceVersion AND {p1:PK}={ts:sourceItem} AND 
"+ " {ts:sourceVersion}=?job.sourceVersion AND {ts:targetVersion}=?job.targetVersion 
"+ " JOIN Media* as p2 
"+ " ON {p2:catalogVersion}=?job.targetVersion AND {p2:PK}={ts:targetItem} } 
"+ " WHERE {p1:modifiedtime}>{ts:lastSyncSourceModifiedTime} 
"+ " }} 
"+ "UNION ALL 
"+
" {{SELECT 
"+ " {p1:PK} as sourceItem, 
"+ " {p2:PK} as targetItem, 
"+ " {p1:modifiedtime} as modifiedTime, 
"+ " null as lastSyncTime, 
"+ " 'Media' as type, 
"+ " {p1:code} as ord 
"+ " FROM {Media* as p1 LEFT JOIN Media* as p2 
"+ " ON {p1:catalogVersion}=?job.sourceVersion AND {p2:catalogVersion}=?job.targetVersion AND 
"+ " {p1:code}={p2:code} 
"+ " LEFT JOIN ItemSyncTimestamp* AS ts 
"+ " ON {ts:sourceVersion}=?job.sourceVersion AND {ts:targetVersion}=?job.targetVersion AND 
"+ " ({ts:sourceItem}={p1:pk} OR {ts:targetItem}={p2:PK} ) } 
"+ " WHERE {p1:catalogVersion}=?job.sourceVersion AND {ts:pk} IS NULL
"+ " }} 
"+ ") tbl 
"+ "ORDER BY 
"+ " CASE 
"+ " WHEN tbl.type = 'Product' THEN 1 
"+ " WHEN tbl.type = 'Category' THEN 2 
"+ " WHEN tbl.type = 'Media' THEN 3 
"+ " WHEN tbl.type = 'Keyword' THEN 4 
"+ " ELSE 10 
"+ " END ASC, 
"+ " tbl.ord ASC, 
"+ " tbl.modifiedTime DESC, 
"+ " tbl.sourceItem ASC "

attribute.description: classification system versions of this catalog
external identificator refering to the actual classification system definition
defines whether or not attributes without value are to be shown for a classified product
list of all attributes available within this class
list all attribute assignments (recursively to the top)

external identifier refering to the actual classification system definition

Format definition string: optionally used e.g. as number format
Visibility of attribute: visible, not_visible, visible_in_base or visible_in_variant
external identifier refering to the actual classification system definition

external identifier refering to the actual classification system definition
external identifier refering to the actual classification system definition
Classification attribute assignment which this value belongs to
position mark for multi value features
position of the feature which this value belongs to
the actual value of this feature
